price: 83. Eso ya se nos prometió a nosotros y a nuestros antepasados con anterioridad, mas no son sino viejas leyendas”.
arabic: لَقَدۡ وُعِدۡنَا نَحۡنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَٰذَا مِن قَبۡلُ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: laqad wuʿid'nā naḥnu waābāunā hādhā min qablu in hādhā illā asāṭīru al-awalīna
